MESSAGE: You got a sword!
Here's an instruction book, try using the arrow keys to open it!
Now that you know the basics, let's try fighting!
I'll take you to the training field so you can practice.
Welcome to the training field! This is where you can practice fighting.
That's a training dummy.
Try holding your sword and clicking on the dummy!
Great job!
Most other enemies will attack you when you attack them.
You'll need to be careful if you want to survive.
Here's a health potion and some armor.
Try switching to the armor slot to see your armor stats.
You use potions by clicking with them in your hand when you are low health.
Each potion will heal you 3 health.
But, there is a 5 second cooldown between each one.
Your maximun health is 10, and potions wont heal you above that.
I'll set your health lower so you can try some out.
Try using some potions to get back to full health!
Great job!
I'll take you into the forest and then you'll be free to adventure.
When you are deep in the forest, you'll have to fight monsters.
Press space when you're ready to go.
I almost forgot!
Whenever you kill monsters, you'll get experience.
Each monster gives you between 15 & 25 experience.
When you get 50 experience, you will level up.
When you reach level 10, you'll get the chance to fight Glamos, the king.
Many have tried, but none have succeeded.
I'll come back here when you're ready.
Now go and get some experience!
Oh! And in order to explore the world, I'll replace your book with a map! Try using it!
The map lets you travel to new places, with different monsters and weapons!
I'll also give you a new sword, this one will do much more damage.
Now, go get that expirence!
Hello!
I'm Pip the Slime!
I'm here to help you out with your first adventure!
Back there on the ground is a box.
Click it to open it!
